description:
Engineered to conquer the most challenging terrain, the THUNDERCROSS is your ticket to off-road adventure. With a precise foothold and plenty of cushioning, you’ll have the confidence to push your boundaries knowing your shoes won’t let you down. Contagrip® outsoles with aggressive 5mm lugs promise grip on loose or muddy surfaces.

  • Uppers are welded textile with anti-debris mesh for seamless comfort
  • Sensifit™ construction wraps foot with synthetic overlays to provide a precise, secure fit and abrasion protection
  • Quicklace™ systems with reduced-friction lace eyelets
  • energyFOAM midsole absorbs trail impacts with ample energy return
  • Gusseted tongues keep out debris and incorporate lace garages
  • Protective synthetic toe caps
  • Contagrip® outsole with 5mm lugs is designed for varied terrain with reliable grip on wet or rocky trails
name: Salomon Thundercross Trail Running Shoes - Men's
